creditline: The Mr. and Mrs. Bernard M. Granum Fund
description: Plate VI group of 6 woodcuts matted together; a: people standing behind a railing; b: crowd in a station; c: crowd and animals in front of stairs, in wind and rain; d: people walking behind a curtain being parted by a man in a fez accompanied by a man playing a horn; e: crowd of people with little girl in front; f: faces of crowd with fireworks overhead
signed: LRC on a-d and f, LLC on e, in black, in plate: [FV]; in pencil, LRC below image on each sheet [F Vallotton]
title: Fireworks
